doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Md. Rashidoon Nabi Khan
doctor.specialty: Neurosurgery (Brain, Nerve, Stroke & Spinal Surgery) Specialist
doctor.workplace: Sylhet MAG Osmani Medical College & Hospital
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Md. Rashidoon Nabi Khan is a Neurosurgeon in Sylhet. His qualification is MBBS, MS (Neuro Surgery). He is a Professor & Head, Neurosurgery at Sylhet MAG Osmani Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Medical Center, Sylhet. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Md. Rashidoon Nabi Khan at Popular Medical Center, Sylhet is 4pm to 9pm (Closed: Thursday & Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Mostafa Taufiq Ahmed
doctor.specialty: Neurosurgery (Brain, Stroke, Nerve, Paralysis & Spine) Specialist & Surgeon
doctor.workplace: Sylhet MAG Osmani Medical College & Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. Mostafa Taufiq Ahmed is a Neurosurgeon in Sylhet. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MS (Neurosurgery). He is a Assistant Professor, Neurosurgery at Sylhet MAG Osmani Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Mount Adora Hospital, Akhalia, Sylhet. Practicing hour of Dr. Mostafa Taufiq Ahmed at Mount Adora Hospital, Akhalia, Sylhet is 4:30pm to 8:30pm (Sat, Sun, Tue & Wednesday).

doctor.info: Dr. Firoj Ahmed Al-Amin is a Neurosurgeon in Sylhet. His qualification is MBBS (DMC), MS (NEUROSURGERY). He is a Registrar, Neurosurgery at Sylhet MAG Osmani Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Medical Center & Hospital, Sylhet. Practicing hour of Dr. Firoj Ahmed Al-Amin at Popular Medical Center & Hospital, Sylhet is 4pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).
